short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover Black-owned retail alternatives and earn cashback with the Cashblack A.F.R.O.B.O.T

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Cashblack A.F.R.O.B.O.T is our Algorithm For Redirection Of Black-Owned Traffic. It is our browser extension that utilises artificial intelligence to learn how our members shop in order to notify them of Black-owned alternatives to their usual retail destinations.

For instance, if you were shopping for hair products, you would search for "hair care", related brands or visit commonly visited retailers to purchase hair care products. But if you were visit one of these websites or yield one of these search engine results with the A.F.R.O.B.O.T installed and we will notify you of our Black-owned retail partners offering similar products and take you their websites for you to earn cashback on your purchases from them.
